mapper.select: SELECT CATE_NO , CATE_NAME , IS_USE FROM BOARD_CATEGORY ORDER BY CATE_NO

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_BOARD_DATE , TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_BOARD_DATE_ORDER , READ_CNT , CATE_NO , REPLY_CNT , IS_PRIVATE , IS_NOTICE FROM UNI_BOARD WHERE READ_CNT >= 0
AND TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, #{month}), 'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{fromDate} AND TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{toDate}
ORDER BY REG_BOARD_DATE DESC OFFSET #{offsetCnt} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{displayCnt} ROWS ONLY

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_BOARD_DATE , TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_BOARD_DATE_ORDER , READ_CNT , CATE_NO , REPLY_CNT , IS_PRIVATE , IS_NOTICE FROM UNI_BOARD
WHERE TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, #{month}), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} DESC

SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NO) FROM UNI_BOARD WHERE READ_CNT >= 0
AND TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD' ) >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, #{month}), 'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{fromDate} AND TO_CHAR(REG_BOARD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #{toDate}
AND UPPER(${searchKeyword}) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{searchValue}) || '%'
SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER , REG_BOARD_DATE , READ_CNT , CATE_NO , REPLY_CNT , IS_PRIVATE , IS_NOTICE FROM UNI_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
